document.full_text: punchdrunk, a british site-specific theater company, has taken over three abandoned warehouses to enact the sorry sights of the murderous macbeths' career in a movable orgy titled 'sleep no more.'
document.title: theater review | 'sleep no more': shakespeare slept here, albeit fitfully
lines_and_colors: punchdrunk, a british site-specific theater company, has taken over three abandoned warehouses to enact the sorry sights of the murderous macbeths' career in a movable orgy titled 'sleep no more.'
